Class Booking

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Booking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Booking extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a booking made by a customer for a specific flight.
See Also:

  • Field Details

    • serialVersionUID

      private static final long serialVersionUID
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • nextBookingId

      private static int nextBookingId

    • bookingId

      private final int bookingId

    • customer

      private final Customer customer

    • flight

      private Flight flight

    • bookingDate

      private LocalDate bookingDate

    • seatType

      private SeatType seatType
      The seat class (ECONOMY, BUSINESS, or FIRST) for this booking. Defaults to ECONOMY if not otherwise specified.

    • foodOption

      private FoodOption foodOption
      The selected food option for this booking, e.g. NO_MEAL, CHICKEN, etc. Defaults to NO_MEAL if not specified.

    • bookingPrice

      private double bookingPrice
      The final price for this booking, including any dynamic pricing. Defaults to 0.0 until the booking is priced.

    • fee

      private double fee
      Any additional fee applied (e.g. cancellation or rebooking fee). Defaults to 0.0 if no extra fee is needed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(Customer customer, Flight flight, LocalDate bookingDate)
      Constructs a new Booking, assigning a unique booking ID automatically.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer making the booking
      flight - the flight being booked
      bookingDate - the date on which the booking is made

  • Method Details

    • getBookingId

      public int getBookingId()
      Returns the unique booking ID assigned to this booking.
      Returns:
      the booking ID

    • getCustomer

      public Customer getCustomer()
      Returns the customer who made this booking.
      Returns:
      the customer

    • getFlight

      Returns the Flight associated with this booking.
      Returns:
      the flight

    • setFlight

      public void setFlight(Flight flight)
      Sets a different Flight for this booking (e.g. for rebooking).
      Parameters:
      flight - the new flight

    • getBookingDate

      public LocalDate getBookingDate()
      Returns the date on which this booking was created.
      Returns:
      the booking date

    • setBookingDate

      public void setBookingDate(LocalDate bookingDate)
      Sets a different booking date (if needed).
      Parameters:
      bookingDate - the new booking date

    • getSeatType

      public SeatType getSeatType()
      Returns the seat class (ECONOMY, BUSINESS, or FIRST) chosen for this booking.
      Returns:
      the seat type

    • setSeatType

      public void setSeatType(SeatType seatType)
      Sets or changes the seat type for this booking (e.g. from ECONOMY to BUSINESS).
      Parameters:
      seatType - the new seat type

    • getFoodOption

      public FoodOption getFoodOption()
      Returns the selected food option for this booking.
      Returns:
      the food option

    • setFoodOption

      public void setFoodOption(FoodOption foodOption)
      Sets or changes the food option for this booking (e.g. NO_MEAL, CHICKEN, BEEF).
      Parameters:
      foodOption - the new food option

    • getBookingPrice

      public double getBookingPrice()
      Returns the final price for this booking, including any dynamic or seat-class adjustments.
      Returns:
      the booking price

    • setBookingPrice

      public void setBookingPrice(double bookingPrice)
      Sets the final price for this booking (often after dynamic pricing is calculated).
      Parameters:
      bookingPrice - the new booking price

    • getFee

      public double getFee()
      Returns any additional fee for cancellation or rebooking.
      Returns:
      the fee amount

    • setFee

      public void setFee(double fee)
      Sets an extra fee for cancellation or rebooking.
      Parameters:
      fee - the fee amount

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Returns a short string describing the booking details: booking ID, flight number, seat type, food option, price, and fee.
      Returns:
      the short details string
